entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Delson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain beginning this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets early in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
